representation_information.name: OpenDocument Text Document Format (ODT), Version 1.2. Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
representation_information.description: An XML-based format for editable textual documents, usually with .odt as file extension. Part of the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family. Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1. Component files are packaged using a constrained version of the ZIP format. Incorporates an XML-based manifest file to list component files.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
